div.p: Patrons of the Elgin/New Leipzig Public School, Amended 4-1-2020 – The Elgin/New Leipzig Public school will send out busses Monday through Friday on school days starting April 6th. Next Tuesday we will also send out paper and pencil work for those families receiving such work. Homework can be returned using this method as well. We request that if you need meals for the week of April 6th that you let the kitchen know ASAP so we can order supplies...

“The Grant County Ag Department would like to thank Dakota Community Bank of New Leipzig for donating money to the shop. These funds helped the shop purchase a new toolbox, miter saw, wood shaper, and scroll saw.”

ENLPS February STAR students are chosen for their demonstration of outstanding effort & attitude and setting a positive example for their peers.
K-3 STAR Student: Abigail Petrick
4-6 STAR Student: Aiden Ludvigson
7-9 STAR Student: Madison Zimmerman
10-12 STAR Student: Madison Meyer

Thank you FFA members who attended the Beulah Winter CDE Contest! Top 60 participants got awards in each contest. Ag Sales: Madalynn Sauter (9th), Christy Finck (42nd), Kassidy Haase (64th) Agronomy: Evan Friesz (13th), Laura Muggli (15th), Allison Friesz (45th), Anna Schatz (50th)
Livestock: Avery Roth (6th), Luke Maier (85th), Jamie Maier...

The blue ribbon recipients in grades 6-10 will go on to compete at the Regional Science Fair in Mandan on Tuesday, March 17th.
5th Grade
1st Place: Kaydence Zimmerman
2nd Place: Kaylee Maier
3rd Place: Logan Schatz
6th Grade
Blue Ribbon Recipients: Bree Rivinius, Jeramiah Schily, MyKenzie Winkler & Aidan Zacher
1st Place: Aidan Zacher
2nd Place: MyKenzie Winkler
3rd Place: Bree Rivinius
7th Grade
Blue Ribbon...

Congrats to those who competed in the *94th Little International*! Gold members were Evan Friesz in Agronomy, Madalynn Sauter in Ag Sales, and Avery Roth in Livestock! Job well done to all! Little I Contest: Agronomy: Evan Friesz (gold), Allie Friesz (silver) Livestock Judging: Avery Roth (gold), Jamie Maier (bronze), Luke Maier (bronze) Ag Sales: Madalynn Sauter (gold), Kassidy Haase (bronze), Emilie Raab (bronze), Maddie DenBoer (bronze)
Kindred...
The Mission of Elgin/New Leipzig Public School is to provide a positive and safe environment that promotes lifelong learning to all individuals.
